Chris Eberle

CV | Research | LinkedIn | GitHub

I am pursuing a MSc. degree in Physics at LMU Munich, Germany.

My research concerns the reconstruction of the time-variable Gamma-ray sky as part of the Information Field Theory group at the Max-Planck Institute for Astrophysics.

I am currently a Data Science & Machine Learning intern at ray sono with a focus on timeseries forecasting and outlier detection.
